Основные разделы математики включают **Арифметику**, **Алгебру**, **Геометрию**, **Математический анализ** и **Дискретную математику**. Также к ним относятся **Теория вероятностей**, **Математическая статистика**, **Математическая логика**, **Теория множеств** и **Теория чисел**. В учебной программе школ обычно изучают элементарную математику: арифметику, элементарную алгебру и геометрию. 

**Классификация разделов**

Разделы математики можно разделить на фундаментальные и прикладные. 

**Фундаментальные разделы:**

- [Арифметика](https://www.google.com/search?q=%D0%90%D1%80%D0%B8%D1%84%D0%BC%D0%B5%D1%82%D0%B8%D0%BA%D0%B0&client=ms-android-xiaomi-rvo3&sca_esv=637c0e90f834ed3d&sxsrf=AE3TifM1dCi9VQj3eT2iTJFDMIB9YhvvRw%3A1758609600293&ei=wEDSaLjQEcCrxc8P3OiNsAg&oq=%D1%80%D0%B0%D0%B7%D0%B4%D0%B5%D0%BB%D1%8B+%D0%BC%D0%B0%D1%82%D0%B5%D0%BC%D0%B0%D1%82%D0%B8%D0%BA%D0%B8&gs__ynykgcGNC4xNS4xoAfeiAGyBwYyLjE1LjG4B5gRwgcIMC4xLjIuMTfIB-YB&sclient=mobile-gws-wiz-serp&mstk=AUtExfBF1KZFZS461JT86N6J8HEE2kNieTd7GmuuURB3nK5VzeW6KjHtETsYXDoBR_C-0Z_Lfp1_gShlz4OfYvjfWkODVPL6pwSp7pt-Grzd9clfd2Prey0p2PxW6BzKt2kN-ahahPaxBdbWwbQGsvg1-divu9NWxhogeh2KKHex1mbPRSzihiIzIfjxBVUvDv2GAkcGQr8soa0xRpkuM576DQut2MloBc1PYSbsLu4rwwK9YneC6d3Cu0SimKIJ39vqASIBalHGP1DSUKJQR7XhA7vg&csui=3&ved=2ahUKEwj1wrSqo-6PAxXEVvEDHXxQOEgQgK4QegQIBRAB): Изучает свойства чисел и действия над ними (сложение, вычитание, умножение, деление). 
- [Алгебра](https://www.google.com/search?q=%D0%90%D0%BB%D0%B3%D0%B5%D0%B1%D1%80%D0%B0&client=ms-android-xiaomi-rvo3&sca_esv=637c0e90f834ed3d&sxsrf=AE3TifM1dCi9VQj3eT2iTJFDMIB9YhvvRw%3A1758609600293&ei=wEDSaLjQEcCrxc8P3OiNsAg&oq=%D1%80%D0%B0%D0%B7%D0%B4%D0%B5%D0%BB%D1%8B+%D0%BC%D0%B0%D1%82%D0%B5%D0%BC%D0%B0%D1%82%D0%B8%D0%BA%D0%B8&gs__ynykgcGNC4xNS4xoAfeiAGyBwYyLjE1LjG4B5gRwgcIMC4xLjIuMTfIB-YB&sclient=mobile-gws-wiz-serp&mstk=AUtExfBF1KZFZS461JT86N6J8HEE2kNieTd7GmuuURB3nK5VzeW6KjHtETsYXDoBR_C-0Z_Lfp1_gShlz4OfYvjfWkODVPL6pwSp7pt-Grzd9clfd2Prey0p2PxW6BzKt2kN-ahahPaxBdbWwbQGsvg1-divu9NWxhogeh2KKHex1mbPRSzihiIzIfjxBVUvDv2GAkcGQr8soa0xRpkuM576DQut2MloBc1PYSbsLu4rwwK9YneC6d3Cu0SimKIJ39vqASIBalHGP1DSUKJQR7XhA7vg&csui=3&ved=2ahUKEwj1wrSqo-6PAxXEVvEDHXxQOEgQgK4QegQIBRAE): Исследует общие свойства математических операций, уравнений, неравенств и структур. 
- [Геометрия](https://www.google.com/search?q=%D0%93%D0%B5%D0%BE%D0%BC%D0%B5%D1%82%D1%80%D0%B8%D1%8F&client=ms-android-xiaomi-rvo3&sca_esv=637c0e90f834ed3d&sxsrf=AE3TifM1dCi9VQj3eT2iTJFDMIB9YhvvRw%3A1758609600293&ei=wEDSaLjQEcCrxc8P3OiNsAg&oq=%D1%80%D0%B0%D0%B7%D0%B4%D0%B5%D0%BB%D1%8B+%D0%BC%D0%B0%D1%82%D0%B5%D0%BC%D0%B0%D1%82%D0%B8%D0%BA%D0%B8&gs__ynykgcGNC4xNS4xoAfeiAGyBwYyLjE1LjG4B5gRwgcIMC4xLjIuMTfIB-YB&sclient=mobile-gws-wiz-serp&mstk=AUtExfBF1KZFZS461JT86N6J8HEE2kNieTd7GmuuURB3nK5VzeW6KjHtETsYXDoBR_C-0Z_Lfp1_gShlz4OfYvjfWkODVPL6pwSp7pt-Grzd9clfd2Prey0p2PxW6BzKt2kN-ahahPaxBdbWwbQGsvg1-divu9NWxhogeh2KKHex1mbPRSzihiIzIfjxBVUvDv2GAkcGQr8soa0xRpkuM576DQut2MloBc1PYSbsLu4rwwK9YneC6d3Cu0SimKIJ39vqASIBalHGP1DSUKJQR7XhA7vg&csui=3&ved=2ahUKEwj1wrSqo-6PAxXEVvEDHXxQOEgQgK4QegQIBRAH): Занимается изучением форм, размеров, положения объектов в пространстве. 
- [Математический анализ](https://www.google.com/search?q=%D0%9C%D0%B0%D1%82%D0%B5%D0%BC%D0%B0%D1%82%D0%B8%D1%87%D0%B5%D1%81%D0%BA%D0%B8%D0%B9+%D0%B0%D0%BD%D0%B0%D0%BB%D0%B8%D0%B7&client=ms-android-xiaomi-rvo3&sca_esv=637c0e90f834ed3d&sxsrf=AE3TifM1dCi9VQj3eT2iTJFDMIB9YhvvRw%3A1758609600293&ei=wEDSaLjQEcCrxc8P3OiNsAg&oq=%D1%80%D0%B0%D0%B7%D0%B4%D0%B5%D0%BB%D1%8B+%D0%BC%D0%B0%D1%82%D0%B5%D0%BC%D0%B0%D1%82%D0%B8%D0%BA%D0%B8&gs__ynykgcGNC4xNS4xoAfeiAGyBwYyLjE1LjG4B5gRwgcIMC4xLjIuMTfIB-YB&sclient=mobile-gws-wiz-serp&mstk=AUtExfBF1KZFZS461JT86N6J8HEE2kNieTd7GmuuURB3nK5VzeW6KjHtETsYXDoBR_C-0Z_Lfp1_gShlz4OfYvjfWkODVPL6pwSp7pt-Grzd9clfd2Prey0p2PxW6BzKt2kN-ahahPaxBdbWwbQGsvg1-divu9NWxhogeh2KKHex1mbPRSzihiIzIfjxBVUvDv2GAkcGQr8soa0xRpkuM576DQut2MloBc1PYSbsLu4rwwK9YneC6d3Cu0SimKIJ39vqASIBalHGP1DSUKJQR7XhA7vg&csui=3&ved=2ahUKEwj1wrSqo-6PAxXEVvEDHXxQOEgQgK4QegQIBRAK): Изучает пределы, производные, интегралы, ряды, непрерывность функций. 
- [Теория чисел](https://www.google.com/search?q=%D0%A2%D0%B5%D0%BE%D1%80%D0%B8%D1%8F+%D1%87%D0%B8%D1%81%D0%B5%D0%BB&client=ms-android-xiaomi-rvo3&sca_esv=637c0e90f834ed3d&sxsrf=AE3TifM1dCi9VQj3eT2iTJFDMIB9YhvvRw%3A1758609600293&ei=wEDSaLjQEcCrxc8P3OiNsAg&oq=%D1%80%D0%B0%D0%B7%D0%B4%D0%B5%D0%BB%D1%8B+%D0%BC%D0%B0%D1%82%D0%B5%D0%BC%D0%B0%D1%82%D0%B8%D0%BA%D0%B8&gs__ynykgcGNC4xNS4xoAfeiAGyBwYyLjE1LjG4B5gRwgcIMC4xLjIuMTfIB-YB&sclient=mobile-gws-wiz-serp&mstk=AUtExfBF1KZFZS461JT86N6J8HEE2kNieTd7GmuuURB3nK5VzeW6KjHtETsYXDoBR_C-0Z_Lfp1_gShlz4OfYvjfWkODVPL6pwSp7pt-Grzd9clfd2Prey0p2PxW6BzKt2kN-ahahPaxBdbWwbQGsvg1-divu9NWxhogeh2KKHex1mbPRSzihiIzIfjxBVUvDv2GAkcGQr8soa0xRpkuM576DQut2MloBc1PYSbsLu4rwwK9YneC6d3Cu0SimKIJ39vqASIBalHGP1DSUKJQR7XhA7vg&csui=3&ved=2ahUKEwj1wrSqo-6PAxXEVvEDHXxQOEgQgK4QegQIBRAN): Сосредоточена на свойствах целых чисел. 
- [Математическая логика](https://www.google.com/search?q=%D0%9C%D0%B0%D1%82%D0%B5%D0%BC%D0%B0%D1%82%D0%B8%D1%87%D0%B5%D1%81%D0%BA%D0%B0%D1%8F+%D0%BB%D0%BE%D0%B3%D0%B8%D0%BA%D0%B0&client=ms-android-xiaomi-rvo3&sca_esv=637c0e90f834ed3d&sxsrf=AE3TifM1dCi9VQj3eT2iTJFDMIB9YhvvRw%3A1758609600293&ei=wEDSaLjQEcCrxc8P3OiNsAg&oq=%D1%80%D0%B0%D0%B7%D0%B4%D0%B5%D0%BB%D1%8B+%D0%BC%D0%B0%D1%82%D0%B5%D0%BC%D0%B0%D1%82%D0%B8%D0%BA%D0%B8&gs__ynykgcGNC4xNS4xoAfeiAGyBwYyLjE1LjG4B5gRwgcIMC4xLjIuMTfIB-YB&sclient=mobile-gws-wiz-serp&mstk=AUtExfBF1KZFZS461JT86N6J8HEE2kNieTd7GmuuURB3nK5VzeW6KjHtETsYXDoBR_C-0Z_Lfp1_gShlz4OfYvjfWkODVPL6pwSp7pt-Grzd9clfd2Prey0p2PxW6BzKt2kN-ahahPaxBdbWwbQGsvg1-divu9NWxhogeh2KKHex1mbPRSzihiIzIfjxBVUvDv2GAkcGQr8soa0xRpkuM576DQut2MloBc1PYSbsLu4rwwK9YneC6d3Cu0SimKIJ39vqASIBalHGP1DSUKJQR7XhA7vg&csui=3&ved=2ahUKEwj1wrSqo-6PAxXEVvEDHXxQOEgQgK4QegQIBRAQ) и [Теория множеств](https://www.google.com/search?q=%D0%A2%D0%B5%D0%BE%D1%80%D0%B8%D1%8F+%D0%BC%D0%BD%D0%BE%D0%B6%D0%B5%D1%81%D1%82%D0%B2&client=ms-android-xiaomi-rvo3&sca_esv=637c0e90f834ed3d&sxsrf=AE3TifM1dCi9VQj3eT2iTJFDMIB9YhvvRw%3A1758609600293&ei=wEDSaLjQEcCrxc8P3OiNsAg&oq=%D1%80%D0%B0%D0%B7%D0%B4%D0%B5%D0%BB%D1%8B+%D0%BC%D0%B0%D1%82%D0%B5%D0%BC%D0%B0%D1%82%D0%B8%D0%BA%D0%B8&gs__ynykgcGNC4xNS4xoAfeiAGyBwYyLjE1LjG4B5gRwgcIMC4xLjIuMTfIB-YB&sclient=mobile-gws-wiz-serp&mstk=AUtExfBF1KZFZS461JT86N6J8HEE2kNieTd7GmuuURB3nK5VzeW6KjHtETsYXDoBR_C-0Z_Lfp1_gShlz4OfYvjfWkODVPL6pwSp7pt-Grzd9clfd2Prey0p2PxW6BzKt2kN-ahahPaxBdbWwbQGsvg1-divu9NWxhogeh2KKHex1mbPRSzihiIzIfjxBVUvDv2GAkcGQr8soa0xRpkuM576DQut2MloBc1PYSbsLu4rwwK9YneC6d3Cu0SimKIJ39vqASIBalHGP1DSUKJQR7XhA7vg&csui=3&ved=2ahUKEwj1wrSqo-6PAxXEVvEDHXxQOEgQgK4QegQIBRAR): Изучают формальные системы, логические связки и множества. 
- [Дискретная математика](https://www.google.com/search?q=%D0%94%D0%B8%D1%81%D0%BA%D1%80%D0%B5%D1%82%D0%BD%D0%B0%D1%8F+%D0%BC%D0%B0%D1%82%D0%B5%D0%BC%D0%B0%D1%82%D0%B8%D0%BA%D0%B0&client=ms-android-xiaomi-rvo3&sca_esv=637c0e90f834ed3d&sxsrf=AE3TifM1dCi9VQj3eT2iTJFDMIB9YhvvRw%3A1758609600293&ei=wEDSaLjQEcCrxc8P3OiNsAg&oq=%D1%80%D0%B0%D0%B7%D0%B4%D0%B5%D0%BB%D1%8B+%D0%BC%D0%B0%D1%82%D0%B5%D0%BC%D0%B0%D1%82%D0%B8%D0%BA%D0%B8&gs__ynykgcGNC4xNS4xoAfeiAGyBwYyLjE1LjG4B5gRwgcIMC4xLjIuMTfIB-YB&sclient=mobile-gws-wiz-serp&mstk=AUtExfBF1KZFZS461JT86N6J8HEE2kNieTd7GmuuURB3nK5VzeW6KjHtETsYXDoBR_C-0Z_Lfp1_gShlz4OfYvjfWkODVPL6pwSp7pt-Grzd9clfd2Prey0p2PxW6BzKt2kN-ahahPaxBdbWwbQGsvg1-divu9NWxhogeh2KKHex1mbPRSzihiIzIfjxBVUvDv2GAkcGQr8soa0xRpkuM576DQut2MloBc1PYSbsLu4rwwK9YneC6d3Cu0SimKIJ39vqASIBalHGP1DSUKJQR7XhA7vg&csui=3&ved=2ahUKEwj1wrSqo-6PAxXEVvEDHXxQOEgQgK4QegQIBRAU): Рассматривает конечные и счётные структуры, такие как графы, алгоритмы и комбинаторика. 

**Прикладные разделы и смежные области:**

- [Теория вероятностей](https://www.google.com/search?q=%D0%A2%D0%B5%D0%BE%D1%80%D0%B8%D1%8F+%D0%B2%D0%B5%D1%80%D0%BE%D1%8F%D1%82%D0%BD%D0%BE%D1%81%D1%82%D0%B5%D0%B9&client=ms-android-xiaomi-rvo3&sca_esv=637c0e90f834ed3d&sxsrf=AE3TifM1dCi9VQj3eT2iTJFDMIB9YhvvRw%3A1758609600293&ei=wEDSaLjQEcCrxc8P3OiNsAg&oq=%D1%80%D0%B0%D0%B7%D0%B4%D0%B5%D0%BB%D1%8B+%D0%BC%D0%B0%D1%82%D0%B5%D0%BC%D0%B0%D1%82%D0%B8%D0%BA%D0%B8&gs__ynykgcGNC4xNS4xoAfeiAGyBwYyLjE1LjG4B5gRwgcIMC4xLjIuMTfIB-YB&sclient=mobile-gws-wiz-serp&mstk=AUtExfBF1KZFZS461JT86N6J8HEE2kNieTd7GmuuURB3nK5VzeW6KjHtETsYXDoBR_C-0Z_Lfp1_gShlz4OfYvjfWkODVPL6pwSp7pt-Grzd9clfd2Prey0p2PxW6BzKt2kN-ahahPaxBdbWwbQGsvg1-divu9NWxhogeh2KKHex1mbPRSzihiIzIfjxBVUvDv2GAkcGQr8soa0xRpkuM576DQut2MloBc1PYSbsLu4rwwK9YneC6d3Cu0SimKIJ39vqASIBalHGP1DSUKJQR7XhA7vg&csui=3&ved=2ahUKEwj1wrSqo-6PAxXEVvEDHXxQOEgQgK4QegQIBxAB) и [Математическая статистика](https://www.google.com/search?q=%D0%9C%D0%B0%D1%82%D0%B5%D0%BC%D0%B0%D1%82%D0%B8%D1%87%D0%B5%D1%81%D0%BA%D0%B0%D1%8F+%D1%81%D1%82%D0%B0%D1%82%D0%B8%D1%81%D1%82%D0%B8%D0%BA%D0%B0&client=ms-android-xiaomi-rvo3&sca_esv=637c0e90f834ed3d&sxsrf=AE3TifM1dCi9VQj3eT2iTJFDMIB9YhvvRw%3A1758609600293&ei=wEDSaLjQEcCrxc8P3OiNsAg&oq=%D1%80%D0%B0%D0%B7%D0%B4%D0%B5%D0%BB%D1%8B+%D0%BC%D0%B0%D1%82%D0%B5%D0%BC%D0%B0%D1%82%D0%B8%D0%BA%D0%B8&gs__ynykgcGNC4xNS4xoAfeiAGyBwYyLjE1LjG4B5gRwgcIMC4xLjIuMTfIB-YB&sclient=mobile-gws-wiz-serp&mstk=AUtExfBF1KZFZS461JT86N6J8HEE2kNieTd7GmuuURB3nK5VzeW6KjHtETsYXDoBR_C-0Z_Lfp1_gShlz4OfYvjfWkODVPL6pwSp7pt-Grzd9clfd2Prey0p2PxW6BzKt2kN-ahahPaxBdbWwbQGsvg1-divu9NWxhogeh2KKHex1mbPRSzihiIzIfjxBVUvDv2GAkcGQr8soa0xRpkuM576DQut2MloBc1PYSbsLu4rwwK9YneC6d3Cu0SimKIJ39vqASIBalHGP1DSUKJQR7XhA7vg&csui=3&ved=2ahUKEwj1wrSqo-6PAxXEVvEDHXxQOEgQgK4QegQIBxAC): Изучают вероятностные модели и анализ данных. 
- [Прикладная математика](https://www.google.com/search?q=%D0%9F%D1%80%D0%B8%D0%BA%D0%BB%D0%B0%D0%B4%D0%BD%D0%B0%D1%8F+%D0%BC%D0%B0%D1%82%D0%B5%D0%BC%D0%B0%D1%82%D0%B8%D0%BA%D0%B0&client=ms-android-xiaomi-rvo3&sca_esv=637c0e90f834ed3d&sxsrf=AE3TifM1dCi9VQj3eT2iTJFDMIB9YhvvRw%3A1758609600293&ei=wEDSaLjQEcCrxc8P3OiNsAg&oq=%D1%80%D0%B0%D0%B7%D0%B4%D0%B5%D0%BB%D1%8B+%D0%BC%D0%B0%D1%82%D0%B5%D0%BC%D0%B0%D1%82%D0%B8%D0%BA%D0%B8&gs__ynykgcGNC4xNS4xoAfeiAGyBwYyLjE1LjG4B5gRwgcIMC4xLjIuMTfIB-YB&sclient=mobile-gws-wiz-serp&mstk=AUtExfBF1KZFZS461JT86N6J8HEE2kNieTd7GmuuURB3nK5VzeW6KjHtETsYXDoBR_C-0Z_Lfp1_gShlz4OfYvjfWkODVPL6pwSp7pt-Grzd9clfd2Prey0p2PxW6BzKt2kN-ahahPaxBdbWwbQGsvg1-divu9NWxhogeh2KKHex1mbPRSzihiIzIfjxBVUvDv2GAkcGQr8soa0xRpkuM576DQut2MloBc1PYSbsLu4rwwK9YneC6d3Cu0SimKIJ39vqASIBalHGP1DSUKJQR7XhA7vg&csui=3&ved=2ahUKEwj1wrSqo-6PAxXEVvEDHXxQOEgQgK4QegQIBxAF): Занимается применением математических методов для решения практических задач в других науках и сферах жизни.
